[Estimating the Risk of Human Herpesvirus 6 and Cytomegalovirus Transmission to Ugandan Infants from Viral Shedding in Saliva by Household Contacts.](index.html)

This article was published in [*Viruses*](https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/12/2/171) and the [pdf is available there](https://www.mdpi.com/1999-4915/12/2/171/pdf). 

**Citation:** Mayer, B.T.; Krantz, E.M.; Wald, A.; Corey, L.; Casper, C.; Gantt, S.; Schiffer, J.T. Estimating the Risk of Human Herpesvirus 6 and Cytomegalovirus Transmission to Ugandan Infants from Viral Shedding in Saliva by Household Contacts. *Viruses* 2020, 12, 171.
